adjectives.description: mistrustful (comparative more mistrustful, superlative most mistrustful)

entries.meaning: Having mistrust, lacking trust (in someone or something).
examples: In the passage I met the nurse. She greeted me with a little smile; but I was mistrustful of professional cheerfulness that night.

entries.meaning: Expressing or showing a lack of trust.
Having a suspicion, imagining or supposing (that something undesirable is the case).

examples: Vp we gad, owt spredding oure sayls and make to the seaward:
Al creeks mistrustful with Greekish countrye refusing.
